channel.title: Posts on Boris Rossovsky
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Boris Rossovsky

item.title: Restoration: Old Family Photo 1
item.description: Restoration of an old family photograph for a client. Restored: Original:

item.title: Augmented Reality: FaucetAR (In Progress)
item.description: Currently in progress. Tasked with creating an augmented reality application, my colleague and I decided to focus on environmentalism and conservation of water and energy. Our app is a mock-up of a future app designed to lower personal impact on the environment while simultaneously saving money.

item.title: Interactive Video: Myrtle's Murder
item.description: Tasked with writing, directing, and producing a trailer for an interactive video. Myrtle’s Murder is a mystery game where the player has to find the killer! Your browser does not support the video tag.

item.title: Motion Graphics: First Preloader
item.description: Tasked with creating a branded, seamless, looping preloader with 3D qualities. Final version: Previous versions:

item.title: Vector Recreation: Nintendo Gameboy
item.description: My first try at vector art. Original photo at left, my recreation in the middle.

item.title: 3D: Steampunk Chess
item.description: Tasked with modeling, texturing, lighting, and rendering a steampunk chess set.

item.title: 3D: Gramophone
item.description: Tasked with modeling, texturing, lighting, and rendering a gramophone with “a modern twist.”

item.title: Ad: Orbital Ordnance
item.description: Tasked with designing a brand for a mobile app, followed by a long-form image to advertise the app.

item.title: Icons: First Vector Art
item.description: My first venture into iconography. Tasked by “Harold Bezingle” (my college instructor, Neil van der King) to create two sets of icons for two different demographics.

item.title: NEXT (George Brown College)
item.description: yearendshow.schoolofdesign.ca Tasked with designing and developing a multi-user portfolio website for graduating students to showcase their work. Responsible for the following: Setting up a public Linux web server Setting up a WordPress installation Setting up a front-end publishing system in WordPress Implementing features from design Styling to fit design For this project, I chose WordPress as the starting point.
